title: 喜闻乐见红石矿脉
author: lzlniu
txt_content:
http://t.williamgates.net/share-1C53_53EEFF5E.html
GT的红石矿脉生成真是喜闻乐见，可是掉落原矿简直丧心病狂。论ic2高级采矿机的重要性（针对矿脉）{:10_514:}

replies.author: 烨s
replies.txt_content: 艾玛，不会玩红石要来也没用............

replies.author: ujkojll
replies.txt_content: 图片还是直接玩帖子里吧

replies.author: lzlniu
replies.txt_content:
